=== Treasure Room ===
You may claim one treasure. Choose wisely - the others will be sealed away.

1. âœ“ [RARE] Flamebrand Longsword (25 dmg, STR +3) - Available

   A masterwork longsword wreathed in flickering flames. Its blade burns with eternal fire, and its hilt is warm to the touch. Warriors who wield this weapon find their strength amplified.

2. âœ“ [RARE] Shadowweave Cloak (8 def, AGI +4) - Available
   shadowed weathered stone pedestal wreathed in darkness
   A cloak woven from shadows themselves, it seems to drink in the light around it. Those who wear it move with uncanny grace, their footsteps silent as whispers.

3. âœ“ [RARE] Stormcaller Staff (20 dmg, MAG +3, WIS +2) - Available
   glowing weathered stone shrine pulsing with arcane energy
   A gnarled oak staff topped with a crackling crystal. Arcs of lightning dance between its tip and the ground. Wielders find their magical prowess enhanced and their understanding deepened.

4. âœ“ [RARE] Titan's Band (END +5) - Available
   sturdy weathered stone stand adorned with fortitude runes
   A thick golden ring inscribed with runes of fortitude. Wearing it fills you with the stamina of giants, allowing you to endure far beyond normal limits.

5. âœ“ [RARE] Arcane Blade (22 dmg, STR +2, MAG +3) - Available
   ornate weathered stone dais marked with dual symbols
   A slender blade that hums with arcane energy. Runes of power flow along its edge, glowing with ethereal light. It channels both martial prowess and magical force, perfect for the spellsword.
